specs.title: machine-learning-model-integration
specs.description: This specification outlines the integration of machine learning models into the physical AI system to enhance decision-making capabilities and adaptability.

specs.title: computer-vision-enhancement
specs.description: This specification details the enhancement of computer vision capabilities in the humanoid robot system to improve environmental perception and interaction.

specs.title: autonomous-navigation-system
specs.description: This specification defines the implementation of an autonomous navigation system for humanoid robots to move safely and efficiently in complex environments.
